title: Coronavirus wreaks havoc in African American neighbourhoods
description: Black Chicagoans account for 70% of coronavirus deaths, despite making up 30% of the population.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Chicago has seen a total of 98 deaths with 72% of them black residents
Stark statistics from Chicago health officials have underscored the heavy toll of coronavirus on black Americans.
